title: Classic Chiropractic
description: Move Better Feel Better Live Better conquer your health
cleaned_text: We fix backs, necks, & sports injuries. Chiropractic + Rehab Backs Back pain is one of the most common complaints we see here at Classic Chiropractic. Necks Neck pain is one of the most common reasons for a patient to visit a chiropractor. There are many causes and conditions related to neck pain. SPORTs INJURIES Many chiropractors treat more than back and neck pain. At Classic Chiropractic we have been treating sport's injuries or extremity injuries for 20 years.
